thread.title: What am I missing with google backup? Something this dumb can't be intentional. | ResetEra
thread.title_full: What am I missing with google backup? Something this dumb can't be intentional. | ResetEra

author: Stay Up Be Easy
title: What am I missing with google backup? Something this dumb can't be intentional. | ResetEra
text:
I've got a 60GB memory phone pushing six years and been running out of memory for at least 2 of those.
I bought a tablet with 32 gigs and an SD card with an additional 500.
I want to keep my images and files so I turned on back up which filled up almost instantly. It's threatening my Gmail so I'm trying to make room.
I downloaded a batch of a few test images to my SD card for the time being, when I go to cloud backup/images and delete the just copied images...it deleted them from the SD card, before I restored them.
There is no option to move them from backup to hardware. Only move to archive or a locked folder.
I want to move stuff from the cloud to an SD card before I find somewhere else for it later. Can I really not do this?
I bought a tablet with 32 gigs and an SD card with an additional 500.

I want to move stuff from the cloud to an SD card before I find somewhere else for it later. Can I really not do this?
